name: Deathly Dagger
description: After combat, inflict Def/Res-7 on foe through their next actions. If unit initiated combat, inflict 7 damage to foe after battle.

refinable.description: After combat, inflict Def/Res-7 on foe through their next actions. If unit initiated combat, inflict 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target after battle.
